00028  SUBROUTINE Stream
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE Domain,      ONLY : ni_f, xl_f, xu_f, yl_f, yu_f
00032  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, fcol
00033  USE FluidParams, ONLY : eta, eta2
00034  IMPLICIT NONE
00035 
00036 ! Local Variables
00037  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00038 
00039 ! Relaxation and streaming steps
00040  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00041    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00042      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00043      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00044      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00045      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00046 
00047      f(ie, j,1) = eta*fcol(i,j,1) + eta2*fcol(ie,j,1)
00048      f( i,jn,2) = eta*fcol(i,j,2) + eta2*fcol(i,jn,2)
00049      f(iw, j,3) = eta*fcol(i,j,3) + eta2*fcol(iw,j,3)
00050      f( i,js,4) = eta*fcol(i,j,4) + eta2*fcol(i,js,4)
00051    END DO
00052  END DO
00053 
00054  RETURN
00055  END SUBROUTINE Stream
